description:
The Westalpen 3L Light Pants by Ortovox offers lightweight performance for men – from the valley to the summit.

The Westalpen system is the most versatile collection by Ortovox yet and offers technical products for the whole mountain and for all conditions. The Westalpen 3L Light Jackets have been developed by Ortovox for demanding mountaineers who are looking for the perfect symbiosis of lightness, protection and functionality. The 3L Dermizax® NX construction protects against extreme weather while the technical design focuses completely upon the needs of alpinists in the high mountains.

For the Westalpen 3L Light Pants Ortovox has also used reinforced material in the hem area to ensure even greater protection against scuffs from crampons or rough mountain surfaces. In addition, an internal 2-topper hem adjustment ensures a neat look and optimum fit over climbing boots.
name: Ortovox Westalpen 3L Light Pants - Mens
